6cs cs practicum in distribut system or how to get your hand dirti do some real work the cours the practic aspect of distribut system are studi through the design and implement of a signific system cs is the practicum for those student who also take cs practic distribut system the cours offer a varieti in project rang from simpl project in internetwork to complex project in distribut system student work in team of or person and choos a project of their interest on which they will work trough out the semest credit hour earn in thi cours rang from to depend on the size and the complex of the project that is develop the cours use the web for all offcial and inform interact on page link to the cs inform page you can find basic inform instruct project descript design plan progress report and final present go to the cs tabl of content page comment to werner vogel

9comput scienc comput scienc fall cours inform august cs is an introductori cours cover a broad rang of comput scienc concept and techniqu includ data abstract recurs program correct gener function object orient program pattern match and languag and their evalu we use the dylan languag an object orient dynam languag develop at appl comput which is well suit for cover a broad rang of introductori comput scienc topic thi is not a cours about the dylan languag it just happen to be the notat that we have chosen for write program the major goal of the cours are to teach student how to think clearli about program and program and to provid a toolbox of modern program techniqu that will be applic in ani languag what cours to take student often wonder whether to take cs or cs cs focus on program skill in the object orient languag java wherea cs provid exposur to a broad rang of comput and program problem use a number of program paradigm includ function object orient and imper program techniqu if you have a good cs background or good formal skill e g mathemat or physic you should probabl take cs transfer between cs and cs in either direct are encourag dure the first two week reach us the best way to reach the cours staff is by post question or comment use the cs web site http www cs cornel edu info cours current cs thi site contain all cours materi and run a conot server which allow student and staff to post question and answer as annot to the handout and problem set in order to access the web site you will need to request a user id and password for the conot system to do 16cs home page frontier of parallel system thorsten von eicken fall locat upson mwf am pm offic hour mon pm pm thu pm pm cours descript parallel machin are here to stay thi is underscor by the fact that all system manufactur offer multiprocessor at the top of their product line howev the debat on how the parallel machin of the futur will look like ha heat up consider in the past few month the feder spend cut are on their way to erad the perform at ani price massiv parallel processor mpp manufactur competitor have bet on glorifi workstat farm are smile while their machin can not offer the same level of perform or eas of use their busi ha not suffer as much becaus these machin are more price competit and can leverag the latest microprocessor develop more quickli at the core of the technolog debat lie a larg number of system issu how to integr a larg number of off the shelf processor into a cost effect system which can be easili program in high level parallel program languag and which can host a vari applic workload thi cours is not about how to program parallel machin although some of that will be the topic of the first few week parallel algorithm languag and architectur have matur consider over the last few year to the point where parallel machin are almost usabl if onli the system support were adequ to allow gener purpos use thi cours will focu on the architectur and oper system aspect requir to support featur taken for grant in sequenti comput such as portabl parallel program power debugg multi user machin access virtual memori and fast i o the first part of the cours will examin two complet parallel system the cm with split c and an atm network of workstat with cc use a vertic approach we will studi the interact between algorithm model languag associ execut model oper system architectur and hardwar implement focuss on the support requir for each of these layer the second part of the cours will focu on specif topic and slice horizont across system select a few key issu for an analysi of the design altern an in depth studi of the ksr and the dash will provid some share memori contrast to the cours cours materi cours format lectur note problem set term project

29cs summer home page cs system program and oper system summer prereq cs or permiss of instructor instructor indupraka kodukula praka cs cornel edu teach assist nawaaz ahm nawaaz cs cornel edu motd motd archiv subject descript prerequsit cours outlin textbook cours schedul quizz grade polici statement on collabor offic hour cours materi send comment subject descript cs system program and oper system an introduct to the logic design of system program with emphasi on multiprogram oper system topic includ process synchron deadlock memori manag input output method inform share protect and secur and file system the impact of network and distribut comput environ on oper system is also discuss thi is a fast pace subject requir constant attent prerequsit complet familiar with the materi of cs is assum in particular a knowledg of comput architectur assembl program languag and program structur is requir i ll cover some of the introductori materi in class as requir but the purpos of that will be to remind the audienc of the materi cours outlin the cours will be organ roughli as follow i say roughli becaus depend on the feedback from the class i may chang the order or the content of particular section we ll start off with an overview of concurr issu we ll discuss synchron issu in particular ensur mutual exclus deadlock detect and prevent algorithm we ll discuss multiprocessor issu as well next we ll go on to memori manag here we ll discuss virtual memori and variou method use to implement virtual memori such as page and segment next we ll cover file system final we ll look at evolut of the tradit oper system and look at micro kernel if time permit we ll have a few lectur on advanc topic such as multi thread and serverless file system textbook the princip text book for the class is the oper system concept book by abraham silberschatz and peter galvin i ll also distribut class note which will cover the materi complet the class note will also be avail on the world wide web from the class home page at the end of each class cours schedul we will meet monday thru thursday from am am dure the week of there will be two in class quizz the first will be on and the second will be on the final will be on in addit there will be weekli assign for the first week of class these will be hand out on thursday and will be due the follow thursday at the start of the class quizz grade each of the homework will carri a weightag of for a combin weightag of the final will be worth and there will be two midterm worth each there will also be surpris quizz to determin the understand of the cours materi by the class polici statement on collabor at most peopl can form a group and collabor on each homework each such group will need to submit onli one copi of the homework the quizz and the final will be close book and close note offic hour indupraka kodukula monday etc nawaaz ahm tuesday wednesday thursday upson cours materi send comment maintain by indupraka kodukula 31cs home page introduct to digit system and comput organ thorsten von eicken fall tue thu pm pm kimbal b topic includ represent of inform machin assembl languag processor organ interrupt and i o memori hierarchi combinatori and sequenti circuit data path and control unit design rtl and microprogram help if you have a problem relat to a lectur a homework set or a project the best way to get help is to add an annot at the appropri point in the cours materi thi will allow you to get help not onli from the cours staff but also from your class mate otherwis you should send email to cs cs cornel edu or talk to one of the consult cours materi all cours materi are on a separ web server which you may want to bookmark and use conot to allow annot of the web document the cours materi includ lectur note section note homework and project file cours inform out of date for up to date inform pleas check the cours materi conot account request post befor saturday pm have been process pleas send me email if you encount difficulti read the cours inform for homework follow the hidden instruct on how to sign up for the cours materi section start thi monday conot registr list list of who s made it through the registr process thi page is maintain by thorsten von eicken

33cs advanc databas system cs advanc databas system time am tuesday and thursday place upson survey propos due project propos due prelim exam p up a paper survey due mid project evalu project complet final exam am ho content lectur schedul prelim sampl question answer outsid firewal prelim result stat project and survey project info the predat dbm current project survey list outsid firewal refer materi list handout note and mail archiv cours descript prerequisit textbook c inform grade professor teach assist cours descript cs is be offer for the first time in fall it is intend to give student a solid background in the design and develop of databas manag system dbm s databas system are possibl the world s largest piec of softwar and certainli among the most valuabl piec of softwar while a dbm is in one sens a giant applic program there are surprisingli mani principl behind it develop and use the databas industri is grow and thrive and the demand for knowledg databas engin is much greater than the suppli the databas research commun is also activ and there are alway new problem to be address becaus of the explos amount of data that peopl wish to access thi cours form essenti background for anyon who want to a becom a system engin at a databas develop compani or b becom an inform user of databas system or c becom a databas system research or d develop system in ani domain that manipul larg amount of data or e find out how a teller machin realli work a number of advanc fundament dbm concept will be cover although thi is not intend to be an introductori cours it is a new cours and there may be student in the class with differ background consequ the discuss of variou topic will begin with a quick review of basic materi taught in cs click here for a tent list of topic to be cover in term of workload here s what the cours involv there will be a midterm and a final examin these will test a breadth of basic concept each student will have to do a survey paper on a specif advanc topic here is a list of possibl topic the purpos of thi is to be awar that what is be taught in the cours is onli a fraction of what is out there thi paper will be due three week after the midterm and should be complet with refer it will requir read paper from journal and confer proceed in the engin librari i will suggest initi refer and you will have to pursu addit refer from there click here for inform on refer materi in the librari a develop project involv c program look here for more inform there will be no written homework assign student take turn write lectur note depend on enrol thi mean each person will have to take note onc or twice in the semest hope thi addit work will turn out to be use around exam time here are the detail in ps develop project the term project is an import part of the cours and will involv a signific amount of c program you can choos whether you wish to work alon or in team of two howev the two person project will involv proport more work the goal of the project is two fold a to get hand on experi at build some specif dbm compon b to get comfort work with a larg pre exist code base and modifi it in a modular manner the second goal is as import as the first one becaus all databas system are huge softwar system and rare do you have the luxuri of start from scratch thi forc you to write modular code and also to understand the interact between the differ system compon when the inevit bug appear there are two research dbm prototyp that will be use in the project one is minibas which is softwar associ with the textbook it is a simpl singl user databas system that provid all the compon from the sql parser down to the disk manag thi should hope be avail depend on our be abl to compil and run it in our comput environ the import part of minibas is the interfac descript of the variou system compon the actual code come from class project consequ project use minibas will involv write a compon like the buffer manag base on a specif of it c interfac the other prototyp is predat which is a queri process engin that i have been develop for my research there are a number of possibl project some of which could lead to research topic that can be built on top of predat the focu here is on the high end function like complex queri and new data type if you are not familiar with c i recommend a minibas project becaus the amount of design need is minim if you think you are interest in databas system research then you should do a predat project if you fall in neither categori then you should decid whether you want a project at the lower level dbm storag access buffer area or the higher level queri process optim area and choos between minibas lower level and predat higher level there are also some gener project that involv neither system if you have your own idea on a suitabl project you should talk with me about it well in advanc of the project propos date here is a tent list of possibl project in all the project there will be certain step that should be follow as part of the project propos you should discuss with me and submit an order list of piec of function that the project will produc there will be a mid project review in which you meet with me to discuss the progress that you have made toward complet the project the code you write must follow the code convent of the particular system that you are work on a detail code convent document will be provid and should be follow close thi is someth that i will be veri picki on and that will contribut to the grade you get on the project project submiss should includ a demo and a reason amount of test data some use refer are home page for predat home page for minibas cours textbook the primari text is a beta edit of a new book on databas system databas manag system by raghu ramakrishnan thi book contain mani more detail than are in most other introductori databas book it is also associ with free softwar for an instruct databas system minibas which we might use in class assign the textbook is avail in the campu store for here are other textbook which could be use as refer korth silberschatz databas system concept mcgraw hill second edit thi is the standard introductori databas text but lack the detail to be use in a graduat cours michael stonebrak read in databas system morgan kaufmann second edit thi is a collect of rel recent paper in the area collect and introduc by stonebrak who develop the ingr postgr and illustra databas system mani of these are fundament paper on core area elmasri navath fundament of databas system benjamin cum second edit thi is an altern introductori databas text gray reuter transact process concept and techniqu morgan kaufmann thi is the bibl of transact process page long and tell you all there is to know and a lot more about transact it is a wonder refer to clear up confus aspect of concurr control recoveri transact semant etc some refer materi ha also been place in the librari click here for detail c inform here are some resourc about c program c tutori cs s the c languag under construct debug with gdb gnu make grade polici the grade for the cours will be assign base on the follow percentag prelim mid term exam final exam survey paper lectur note term project the prelim exam will be on the even of oct th at pm in upson a it will be set to be comfort finish in hr but an extra half hour will be provid for those who need it likewis for the final exam the final should be in exam period thur dec am but thi again is tent and need to be confirm the final exam will focu on materi not test in the mid term but the materi cover in the earlier part of the cours may form background for some of the question professor praveen seshadri offic upson phone e mail praveen cs offic hour am tuesday and thursday teach 36cs semant of program languag cs semant of program languag content descript text and prerequisit handout scribe lectur note homework assign contact inform relev web link descript lectur mwf am upson though cs is call advanc program languag in the cours book it is better entitl semant of program languag the goal of thi cours is not to conduct a broad survey of hi tech program languag like c java or sml nor to directli studi implement mechan for these languag e g compress dispatch tabl for multipl inherit rather the goal of thi cours is to studi the principl of formal notat for describ comput and tool for analyz and prove properti of comput these concern subsum the studi of specif program languag or implement mechan and henc lead to a deeper understand of program specif logic mathemat and proof theori for exampl we will studi notat for abstractli specifi how program comput oper semant as well as notat for describ what program comput denot semant in turn the abstract but precis realiz of these notat will allow us to studi techniqu induct logic relat for formal prove interest and relev properti of program languag e g type safeti or compil correct ideal a student come out of thi cours will have learn someth about how to make inform concept and notat precis and how to manipul the notat to demonstr use properti textbook semant of program languag carl a gunter ml for the work programm second edit larri paulson prerequisit on the program side we assum experi with at least a pascal or c like languag prefer student will have some knowledg and experi work with a function languag such as scheme ml or haskel on the theoret side we assum a basic profici in undergradu mathemat logic and comput scienc a basic knowledg of comput e g ture machin recurs function and logic e g predic calculu as well as some mathemat matur is requir thi cours is design for phd student in cs math or and ee it is not for meng or undergradu student if you are an meng or undergradu student you must talk to the instructor to find out if the cours is suitabl for you contact inform newsgroup cornel class cs instructor greg morrisett upson c jgm cs cornel edu offic hour mf after class or by appoint admin assist linda competillo upson ta úlfar erlingsson upson ulfar cs cornel edu offic hour tue pm thu pm relev web link mark leon s resourc for program languag research emac mode for ml ml home click here to send me e mail problem solv exercis one of the most import skill you will learn in thi class is problem solv good problem solv skill distinguish a good comput programm from a bad one it doesn t matter how familiar or skill you are in a particular program languag if you do not understand how to solv the problem then you will not be abl to write a comput program for it in ani languag to help you learn problem solv skill and techniqu i will assign weekli problem solv exercis these will be small but non trivial problem which i will give out each monday you should look at the problem and think about it dure the week and right down the step you would go through to solv the problem i e the overal structur of your program thi is primarili an exercis in gener problem solv so you do not have to write ani fortran code though you may if you want to and have time and your solut algorithm should not even be depend on a particular program languag such as fortran we will go over click here to send me e mail problem solv exercis one of the most import skill you will learn in thi class is problem solv good problem solv skill distinguish a good comput programm from a bad one it doesn t matter how familiar or skill you are in a particular program languag if you do not understand how to solv the problem then you will not be abl to write a comput program for it in ani languag and think about it dure the week and right down the step you would go through to solv the problem i e the overal structur of your program thi is primarili an exercis in gener problem solv so you do not have to write ani fortran code though you may if you want to and have time and your solut algorithm should not even be depend on a particular program languag such as fortran we will go over the solut in class the follow monday exercis comput lab you will be use the vectra lab in rm comput scienc statist contain hewlett packard vectra s run microsoft window and microsoft fortran thi lab is open from am to am seven day a week except certain holiday the printer room is locat across the hall in rm you have a quota of page on which to print onc you exceed that quota you must contact the lab either by e mail or by go to room dure offic hour they prefer e mail to pay to increas your quota bewar some of the machin in the vectra lab aren t configur correctli in particular the machin along the wall closest to the outsid hallway toward the left hand part of the room tri to avoid those if you can you may also use your home or dorm comput to write your program howev you will probabl have to purchas your own copi of microsoft fortran or lahey person fortran see the insid cover of the textbook you may also work in ani of the other comput lab on campu howev most do not have fortran or program pleas let me know as earli in the semest as possibl offic hour polici if you need help debug a program the best way to get help is to visit ani one of the cs ta s dure hi offic hour take along a current hard copi of your program my offic hour are intend as a time for me to re explain concept that i have present in class but about which you are still confus or to answer your specif question about cours materi i encourag you to use email as a reliabl way to contact me about ani problem i read and respond to email sever time daili almost everi day of the week program grade program are grade on all of the follow criteria correct the program should behav correctli normal on typic input the program should behav as state in the project specif clariti the program should be easi to read and understand see the note on style below for more inform about clariti robust correct behavior in extrem or unusu situat the program should handl such situat in a reason and logic manner that is it should not simpli blow up qualiti of test data the test data for the program should demonstr all facet of the program s capabl includ unusu case effici avoid unnecessarili ineffici algorithm or construct howev effici should never be pursu at the expens of clariti modular the program should be modular and should make effect use of paramet complet you should incorpor all inform into your program there should be no need for ani sort of extra paper document gener the program should be as gener as possibl subject to consider of effici and clariti you should avoid arbitrari limit such as a bound on the size or complex of the input whenev possibl when limit are necessari they should be express as defin constant near the top of the program so that they can be easili chang the onli numer liter that should appear in your program are those valu not veri like to chang such as or style use meaning identifi name use a consist name scheme for identifi name a suggest convent is as follow int variable_nam int function_nam int argument const int defined_const enum enumtyp valu valu class classnam do not put multipl statement on a singl line skip line between function group of code use a clear and consist indent style see the dewitt note for a suggest style indent continu statement if loop etc line up s and s label s meaning e g while done extern document thi should be includ as a long comment at the begin of your program it is address to both the typic user and to someon who want to know superfici how the program work includ your full name and student id at the begin of the comment give a gener descript of what the program doe tell how to use the program how to call it format of data give limit bug special featur and assumpt made describ neg as well as posit aspect of the program if you don t includ neg we will assum you were unawar of them inform includ in the assign about the problem descript need not be repeat but may be briefli summar for the first point abov a statement refer the user to the assign document is then suffici note that thi onli appli to the problem descript intern document there are four main type of intern document header comment at the header of function class and major data structur should describ their purpos assumpt about their paramet and the main outlin of ani algorithm they use declar comment next to a declar of a variabl or data member should provid extra inform not convey by the identifi s name the name of a variabl should tell as much about it as is possibl without make it too long addit inform can be suppli by a comment for exampl int top index of last element ad to stack you should use comment to explain paramet as well as local variabl within segment of code tricki or opaqu section of code should be avoid but sometim they are necessari in such case a comment can help the reader understand what s go on between segment of code these comment clarifi the top level outlin of your algorithm use unix and vi mani peopl work with unix for the first time will find that it take some time to becom comfort with it thi is particularli true if your onli previou program experi is with pascal use macpasc on a macintosh i strongli urg you to put in the time earli in the semest to becom comfort with unix while thi time may be pain it is time well spent also you may wish to attend a unix tutori they will be held in room comp sci in two session on each of the follow day tba you will want to pick up a copi of cs befor you go the program develop cycl the program develop cycl in a unix environ is for edit your program vi program c compil your program g wall g program c if there are compil error continu run your program a out inputfil outputfil look at your output vi outputfil or more outputfil if there are no error break if you are too tire to continu print a list to take home pr program c inputfil outputfil lpr goto home debug the program gdb a out run quit you re done turn in the result submiss instruct to be given out later

147cs t web oper system cs t web oper system uniqu no mwf tay the recent explos of interest in the world wide web ha result in an evolv set of protocol for use it these protocol address the tradit concern of oper system interprocess commun resourc alloc secur etc but do so in the more gener context of the internet the goal of thi class is to provid an understand of the current state of the art in web oper system and also to address problem that must be solv to provid a matur gener purpos web oper system a key hypothesi behind the design of thi class is that mani of the issu now be address in the context of the web also have been address in other more tradit area of oper system we will occasion read non web relat paper that may have some bear on understand current web problem class project report pointer to internet research and refer inform about the class syllabu read list and schedul and a longer less organ list of paper class roster handout verif of ssl protocol proof sketch guidelin for final project talk and report

155cs p foundat of comput scienc cs p foundat of comput scienc cs p is an introduct to comput scienc and program thi section of cs p is intend for cs major who have had at least a semest of program in high school the cours number will be chang to cs next year if you have never taken a program cours befor you should take porter s section of cs p instead a strong math background at least through precalculu is requir we will use the program languag scheme a dialect of lisp the scheme implement we will use is call gambit and run on macintosh comput thi cours will move faster than the previou cs p cours and will emphas cs concept more than program languag syntax we will do a lot of program and work hard while hope learn a lot and have fun syllabu ftp directori for softwar and scheme tutor copi scheme for your pc assign machin languag simul assign surf the web assign basic scheme assign play peano and gambl assign turtl graphic assign snow and tree assign list manipul studi guid for exam oct vocabulari for exam oct assign the plot thicken assign treasur hunt assign symbol algebra assign data abstract and matric studi guid for exam nov assign draw tree assign express unpars assign languag translat studi guid for final exam thur dec in tay

and some in room while the mac offer mcl and a varieti of other languag such as mathematica the mscc unix host offer c lex yacc allegro common lisp and other softwar facil macintosh common lisp provid a particularli power environ includ full implement of the common lisp standard integr editor call fred and extens facil for graphic and user interfac construct the macintosh comput are network and file can easili be transfer between them and the unix host machin of mscc student who have difficulti get to the macintosh in thompson hall can supplement their macintosh work with work on their own pc use such packag as xlisp stat for window and micro emac howev due to our limit abil to support altern facil student who wish to work on their own pc will need to access these resourc themselv from archiv on the internet also note that xlisp stat is a bare bone implement of common lisp and doe not have the extens program develop support that mcl ha while we are fortun to have the power mcl system for thi cours there is one disadvantag of use it you must use it in the mscc lab unless you purchas your own copi of it from digitool inc mcl normal cost about a copi but there is a special includ parallel supercomput allow programm to develop code on their workstat and trivial migrat them to the largest parallel machin simpli by recompil zpl wa develop at uw and is just be releas to the scientif comput commun cse zp is a class design for scientist and engin who are not comput scientist but who want to learn how to use modern languag and supercomput effect for scientif comput the class will cover the follow topic the state of the art in high perform comput zpl syntax and semant algorithm exploit high perform parallel machin wysiwyg perform write fast program easili develop zpl program from workstat to supercomput how well doe your program perform i e do more scienc with a faster program prototyp scientif comput in matlab and zpl text book none the class will reli on materi 224cse x home page cse x experiment uw boe softwar engin project cours professor nanci leveson offic sieg phone hour by appoint mail leveson cs washington edu cours descript instruct object teach the terminolog and concept of softwar engin teach the fundament of softwar project manag and work in a team provid experi with a real industri softwar engin project teach oral and written commun skill produc a portfolio thi cours will studi the concept method and tool for the specif design construct test analysi and document of larg softwar system includ also will be non technic topic essenti to creat complex softwar system success project manag effect oral and written commun and group interact these latter topic are what most industri feedback say are the most import to employ and are the most often lack in our graduat thi experiment version of cse last two quarter will use a real boe project as an exampl and the particip will work in one larg group there are sever reason for tri thi new approach the first is that one quarter is too short for a realist project so student can not learn enough about softwar engin due to class session be devot to discuss and organ the project in the regular class the group project are also usual learn experi about how hard it is to work in a group but not enough is learn about how to work effect togeth by have one group head by the instructor disast can be avoid and more experi can be provid in the correct way to work togeth in addit student will get experi in requir analysi and a real softwar develop that is not possibl in the normal class set at the end of the two quarter student will have a portfolio of a real softwar engin project that they can use in their job search an exampl of such a portfolio done for the cmu softwar engin institut s master of softwar engin program will be provid at the first class meet in the class each student will be assign a specif role to play that will allow them to experi a leadership posit see attach list of role howev everyon will particip in each phase of the project so they can learn how to do each part the instructor will act as the project manag outlin of topic natur qualiti and principl of softwar and softwar engin manag of softwar project process model work in group project plan risk assess cost estim metric etc requir analysi specif softwar design verif and valid test and analysi configur manag review mainten evolut reus ethic and profession in softwar engin embed system and safeti role for class project each student will take one of these leadership role for the project howev everyon will particip in each activ or in review of the activ so that they get experi with each aspect of a softwar develop team in addit each class member will be respons for a present at a boe review meet project administr assist program manag respons for project plan and control primari duti includ write and updat the project manag plan track the project statu make sure that the proper meet are held and that the work get done on time princip architect respons for the creation of the softwar product primari respons includ the overal consist of the design hardwar and softwar platform issu transit plan design respons for the exist system primari duti includ learn about it augment the document on it if necessari evalu the current system design primari respons is organ the develop of the new system design configur and secur manag respons for chang control and secur primari duti includ write the configur manag plan set up a configur manag system for the project document control organ chang to the document ensur new design is secur human factor specialist respons for user interfac and interact duti includ design of human interfac evalu of it with respect to requir plan user survey and interview with boe employe qualiti assur specialist respons for the overal qualiti of the releas product primari duri includ conduct review of product ensur that design ha requir characterist conduct review of the deliver and other normal qualiti assur duti program manag respons for the mockup and prototyp primari duti are to provid expertis on program languag and implement organ the develop of prototyp and mockup and handl www technic issu document specialist respons for the appear and clariti of all document and for the creation of user manual duti includ determin what tool will be use and provid expertis on them make deliver document readabl and understand and plan user support for the new system mainten and reliabl engin primari respons is creat a guid for the mainten of the deliv product and a reliabl plan

advantag come at a price softwar behavior can be veri complex and unpredict perhap the best public exampl is the three mile island incid in which oper had great difficulti in diagnos the state of the system dure an emerg the requir stage of softwar develop is key to a project s success especi with respect to safeti for that reason my colleagu and i have concentr on requir especi the commun of requir via a requir specif to that end we have develop a state base languag call requir state machin languag or rsml we have valid the use of thi languag by specifi tca ii an avion system for my 260susan calcari s home page susan calcari manag net scout servic comput scienc depart univers of wisconsin madison scal cs wisc edu my titl is internet scout and i manag net scout servic from the comput scienc depart at the univers of wisconsin madison scout servic is a project of the intern and is support by the nation scienc foundat net scout servic support internet user in the higher educ commun by provid time inform about the best resourc and tool on the internet our goal is to help research and educ use the internet effect in their work each week we filter hundr of item about the internet edit and organ the most import and present the inform in multipl usabl format servic includ the scout report the scout toolkit net happen and come soon the scout sprout report a newslett written by kid for kid over peopl receiv the scout report each week via email and thousand more read it on the web the scout report is an annot list of the best new and newli discov internet resourc and tool and it is the onli public of it kind devot to the research and educ commun the scout report is veri select in the item includ in each issu over peopl receiv net happen post everi weekday and again thousand more read it via the web or the newsgroup each day see the net scout servic page for more inform on these and other servic profession background i have been involv in nation wide internet project sinc when i join merit inc in ann arbor the organ that manag the nsfnet backbon project from i work in the inform servic divis of the project and spent three year speak to nation and intern higher educ audienc about the internet and it resourc i also develop and produc the merit network seminar seri the first nation seminar seri focus on the need of internet end user later i becam the director of network inform servic for cerfnet a respect internet provid base in san diego while there i co wrote the propos which result in the award of part of the intern project under a year cooper agreement with the nation scienc foundat nsf in the third year of the agreement nsf termin the portion of the intern base in san diego but chose to continu the work of the internet scout at that time i elect to reloc to wisconsin and request that nsf approv the reloc of the scout project to the comput scienc depart at uw madison to which they heartili agre futur plan for scout servic at thi time the scout servic staff includ jack solock special librarian and myself dure may the project will expand with the addit of fte includ an open system administr posit and an open special librarian posit on june matthew livesey will join the staff as a project assist goal for the new staff will includ expans of the scout toolkit and the addit of disciplin specif servic such as scout report and web page devot to specif area of studi dure scout servic will also branch into one or more research area in collabor with intern support servic and with group at uw madison and other u s campus potenti research topic includ network inform discoveri and retriev nidr and disciplin orient inform gather and public depend on the natur of the research addit staff will be hire and will includ comput scienc research at the graduat and undergradu level for more inform visit our web site to find out more about scout servic or to join ani of our mail list if you are interest in appli for ani of our open posit see the onlin job descript for the system administr or special librarian and send a resum and a write sampl to the address below or feel free to contact me via telephon or email susan calcari internet scout comput scienc depart univers of wisconsin madison w dayton street rm madison wi scal cs wisc edu

ithaca ny gri cs cornel edu short biographi of david gri i wa born in flush new york and spent year there befor i escap i receiv a b s queen colleg in and went to work for the u s naval weapon laboratori as a civilian as a mathematician programm i met my wife to be elain a few month later and we were marri in novemb we went to illinoi for more educ i receiv a master degre in math from paper on the topic thi end up in my wife and i go to munich for almost three year i receiv my doctor under f l bauer and joseph stoer from mit the munich institut of technolog germani in june thi wa in math or numer analysi sinc comput scienc these were not yet kosher i wa an assist professor of comput scienc at stanford from to while at stanford our twin paul and susan were born what made it more excit than usual wa that they were born on the birthday of myself and my twin april so when my twin is in town elain make four birthday cake we left stanford becaus it had no weather we move to cornel which ha weather in and have been snow in ever sinc i wa depart chair in and i becam the william l lewi professor of engin in i had a guggenheim fellowship in return to tabl of content i am better known for my text write and my contribut to educ than on the wonder of my research do what you are good at bloom where you are plant i have receiv a number of award for contribut to educ the in i am proud of all my ph d advise but two stand out susan owicki s thesi laid the foundat for proof of correct of parallel program with the notion of interfer freeness a paper co author by us on the topic won the acm award for best paper in program langaug and system and t v raman s thesi just won the acm best dissert award for raman design and implement a system for speak ani tex latex document includ technic articl and book the same document can be print or spoken be abl to speak mathemat in an effect manner wa an import goal of hi work read for the blind is alreadi use hi system to produc audio cassett i serv as chair of the comput research associ then the comput scienc board in the late s when it open it offic in washington and began serious to repres comput research interest i also conduct the taulbe survey in the period and am proud of obtain essenti complet respons from phd grant comput scienc depart dure that period no other compar survey ha had such a respons rate one year it requir onli telephon call to get the depart to send in their questionnair i receiv the comput research associ s servic award for thi work on the survey and for chair the associ dure it move toward respect and respons i am current editor for ipl acta informatica formal aspect of comput and softwar concept and tool thi edit keep me busi but i enjoy it i tri to take an interest in individu paper when i know the area and will suggest substanti rewrit myself when i believ it will help serv where you can best serv fred b schneider and i are co editor of springer verlag text and monograph in avail a veri broad collect of option horu also seek leverag from the emerg of atm network technolog and from commun techniqu such as activ messag which origin in work on parallel supercomput horu 332home page of seymour v parter seymour v parter professor of comput scienc and mathemat comput scienc depart univers of wisconsin w dayton st madison wi telephon fax email parter cs wisc edu ph d new york univers interest numer method for partial differenti equat research summari at thi time the major emphasi of my work is on the solut of indefinit discret ellipt system of equat classic iter method and most multigrid method onli work effect when the system is posit definit these method can also be made effect when the real or symmetr part of the oper is posit definit on the other hand in the indefinit case direct method which attempt to preserv the spars of the system may encount veri small pivot thu thi is a challeng problem which effect mix concept and procedur from linear algebra and ellipt partial differenti equat i am now involv in sever project which attack thi class of problem these includ precondit studi and research on special multigrid method sampl recent public precondit chebyshev collact discret for ellipt partial differenti equat to appear in siam journal on numer analysi precondit and boundari condit without h estim l condit number and the distribut of the singular valu siam journal on numer analysi vol pp precondit second order ellipt oper condit number and the distribut of the singular valu journal of scientif comput vol pp thi page wa automat creat octob email pub cs wisc edu to report error

univers of maryland curriculum vita area of interest comput vision three dimension shape represent appear model view synthesi activ vision visual group leader wisconsin comput vision group program co chair cvpr research interest view synthesi the goal of thi work is to develop basic tool for control in real time either autonom or interact a virtual camera of a real environ the input is a set of imag or video stream acquir from fix or mobil camera around a site and the output is a panoram visual of the scene in which a virtual user control camera can be move through the environ with thi technolog a user could interact navig through a real environ control a custom path of view of the site that are not predetermin by the input imag the main research question is how to adapt combin a set of basi imag to synthes new view of the scene without d model or d scene reconstruct as an intermedi step recent we have develop an innov techniqu which we call view morph that take two basi imag and interpol a continu rang of in between imag correspond to view on the linear path connect the two camera center visual explor comput vision research have recent start to investig how to activ control the imag acquisit process by control camera paramet we have been studi how to purpos control the posit and orient of a camera in order to dynam adjust viewpoint base on the appear of a three dimension scene the use of real time viewpoint control behavior is import for solv task such as explor an unknown object in order to find specif surfac mark build a global model of an unknown shape or need for accur differenti measur of the camera motion we believ that thi activ approach of move toward viewpoint that are close relat to the geometri of the view object is a veri import and gener one specif graphic display procedur thi capabl for display arbitrari combin of an algorithm s data object in a common frame of refer coupl with interact control of algorithm execut provid a power way to postscript resum postscript graduat coursework postscript dissert research titl structur from motion the invers project problem abstract an import problem in comput vision is recov the d structur of a scene and the posit of the observ within it from one or more project d imag thi is essenti the invers project problem exist structur from motion sfm techniqu solv thi problem by examin multipl imag project from a rigid scene howev sfm ha not been use extens in practic becaus these techniqu are veri sensit to nois do not accur model optic project or restrict the posit of the observ and or the structur of the scene my research use a new techniqu for solv the invers project problem call the concurr projector model which make no assumpt about the scene other than it is rigid and no assumpt about the posit of the observ thi techniqu use a projector base model of project instead of the camera base model tradit use in sfm as a result the algorithm is defin for ani geometr transform in ani dimens not just d perspect project for a given transform and dimens the algorithm identifi when the invers project problem is under constrain and specifi the minimum number of point and imag requir to solv it the concurr projector model can also examin addit point and imag to minim the type of project error that occur in real world applic by allow the projector to approxim intersect thi techniqu is current be appli to the problem of robot navig and explor to both determin the posit of a robot in an unknown environ and at the same time to map thi environ advisor prof charl r dyer research interest comput and machin vision vision base robot navig and explor d comput graphic virtual realiti artifici intellig group comput vision group machin learn research group robot lab teach duti for spring cs introduct to comput program section and fortran cs is a one credit cours which cover the basic program structur need to prepar student for cs and elementari engin cours no prior comput program experi is requir and onli a basic knowledg of comput is assum the materi cover enabl student to write simpl comput program to solv engin problem in elementari cours all program is done in fortran thi cours is intend for student who receiv littl or no program instruct in high school these section are taught entir in the fortran program languag and are intend primarili for engin student and non comput scienc major cs section and home page cs algebra languag program section fortran construct of algorithm problem solv instruct and experi in the use of at least one procedur orient languag e g pascal or fortran survey of other such languag advanc program techniqu prereq advanc high school mathemat prepar or some colleg work in mathemat statist or logic or consent of instructor open to fr thi section is taught entir in the fortran program languag and is intend primarili for engin student and non comput scienc major cs section home page other pointer of interest comput scienc 702jim bednar jim bednar phd candid dept of comput scienc the univers of texa at austin m a in comput scienc univers of texa at austin austin texa may b a in philosophi univers of texa at austin austin texa may b s in electr comput engin univers of texa at austin austin texa decemb research my research concentr on biolog realist model of cognit process use artifici neural network i seek to use the dramat advanc in comput technolog over the past few decad to make equal dramat advanc in our understand of the human mind with the comput power now avail and soon to be avail realist simul of cortic process are becom practic thi enabl us to make and if necessari refut testabl hypothes about brain function the overal goal is to make cognit research into an empir scienc rather than the pure philosoph domain it ha been for centuri my master s thesi tilt aftereffect in a self organ model of the primari visual cortex is nearli complet the abstract visual illus and aftereffect have long been studi by psychologist and vision research becaus these appar function failur might offer insight into how visual process is carri out by the brain a particular class of visual illus call tilt illus and tilt aftereffect are thought to aris in the primari visual cortex of human and thu serv as test case for theori about that area of the brain specif sever research have propos that they result from later inhibit between neuron receiv visual input the thesi examin tilt illus and aftereffect in rf lissom sirosh and miikkulainen a self organ model of the primari visual cortex that incorpor such later interact it is demonstr that the self organ principl drive rf lissom result in aftereffect which are qualit and quantit similar to those measur in human on the basi of these result a new explan for so call indirect effect interact between line with veri differ orient is propos in the thesi the self organ model should also appli to other figur aftereffect such as spatial frequenc aftereffect which we predict result from the same later interact process a preliminari report of the research is avail as a postscript file i am also begin my doctor research which will includ further simul of detail low level visual behavior use an extens of the rf lissom model contact inform email jbednar cs utexa edu mail address the univers of texa at austin depart of comput scienc tay austin tx inform 791home page for marco schneider marco schneider ph d candid depart of comput scienc at the univers of texa at austin research the titl of my dissert is flow rout in comput network my research interest lie in the area of network protocol distribut comput fault toler and in particular self stabil system implicit in the design of ani system is a label of it state as legitim or illegitim we identifi as legitim those state which occur under the correct intend execut of a system all other state are consid illegitim a system is said to be self stabil when regardless of it initi state it is guarante to converg to a legitim state in a finit number of step a system which is not self stabil may stay in an illegitim state forev my vita in postscript public self stabil acm comput survey vol no march self stabil real time decis system in respons comput system step toward fault toler real time system kluwer academ publish an earlier version appear in proceed of the third intern workshop on respons comput system octob stabil of maximum flow tree invit talk proceed of the third annual joint confer on inform scienc novemb submit to inform scienc journal co author with moham g gouda maximum flow rout proceed of the second workshop on self stabil system co author with moham g gouda minimum depth flow rout in prepar co author with moham g gouda and anish arora memori requir for silent stabil to appear in the fifteenth acm symposium on principl of distribut comput co author with shlomi dolev and moham g gouda stabil of minimum span tree in prepar co author with moham g gouda implement flow rout on the internet in prepar to be co author with moham g gouda person interest here is a list of link under construct contact inform offic taylor hall a email marco cs utexa edu postal address the univers of texa at austin depart of comput scienc c taylor austin tx usa marco cs utexa edu

806arthur mak s homepag my two cent how i becam a christian i made a major decis in my life and believ in jesu christ onli a littl more than two month after come to the u s thi wa total unexpect though religi studi wa a compulsori class at the christian high school i attend in hong kong i had no intent to becom a christian at that time i thought that the record of jesu s life in the bibl wa quit credibl and hi teach wa good but i did not take time to think about it deepli as how it relat to my life also my misconcept of the mean of becom a christian wa not clear until i came to the u s in the past i thought there wa no differ between ani christian and me we all do wrong and sin and i thought that if god love everi one of us then it did not matter whether i decid to be a christian or not also i use to think that a true christian should be virtuou and holi so i wa not good enough to be a christian howev after listen to the friend in the church and the fellowship i realiz thing i did not see befor it is true that christian also have sin when they were born they will also stumbl and do wrong howev god becam flesh though he is sinless he is abl to sympath with our weak and if we confess our sin he is faith and just to forgiv us our sin and to cleans us from all unright i john the differ between christian and other peopl is that they trust jesu christ as their saviour they have grate accept christ s redempt for their sin therefor a man is justifi by faith without the deed of the law roman there is no doubt that a christian should live a holi life but we do not have to be holi befor we can becom christian on the contrari we should reli on god and through the strength he give us to becom holi and jesu ha said they that be whole need not a physician but they that are sick matthew if we count on our own strength we are not abl to becom holi we do not know the number of day we have so we ought to seek the truth as earli as we can don t hesit and start to seek now i thank god for lead me to the u s to give me the opportun to realli know him

858jeff dean jeff dean depart of comput scienc engin univers of washington fr seattl wa usa offic chateau sieg here s the view from my offic or would be if those dang build weren t in the way futur plan i plan to graduat in summer after which i ll be join dec s western research laboratori in sunni palo alto we ve just bought a hous in nearbi menlo park here is my curriculum vita postscript i also have a summari postscript of my research and teach experi project i work primarili on the cecil project cecil is a new pure object orient langaug that we are use as a vehicl for integr research in the area of languag design program environ and optim compil techniqu we intend for our techniqu to scale to larg real world program and to keep ourselv true to thi goal we re implement the vortex compil in cecil we current have about line of cecil code in the compil much of our work in thi group involv track down compil bug i also hang out in the spin project meet spin is an extens oper system microkernel which support the dynam adapt of system interfac and implement through direct applic control while still maintain system integr and inter applic isol dure spring quarter i wa one of the organ for cse k the depart s compil seminar research interest my research concern the effici implement of object orient languag through compil optim techniqu in particular i am explor how whole program analysi can be use to improv perform how it affect increment compil and how it interact with other optim techniqu especi profil guid optim techniqu i am also interest in how whole program optim affect languag design if it is assum that the compil will have access to the entir program then mani compromis made in exist languag design becom unnecessari i am interest in appli the lesson learn in explor whole program optim toward design a new system program languag that is both flexibl and effici base on an underli implement that doe whole program analysi to valid my research i have been one of the three princip design and develop of vortex an optim compil for object orient languag vortex defin a languag independ intermedi languag for object orient languag that is high enough level to permit optim of featur such as messag send closur and object creation it also contain a uniqu way of compos optim pass so that they run in parallel obtain better result than repeatedli run the pass separ for exampl the compil appli intraprocedur class analysi profil guid receiv class predict inlin alia analysi split and cse all at onc in a singl combin pass part of the work on vortex ha been to develop way of structur optim pass to permit thi kind of composit while still allow the pass to be develop larg independ of each other we have a nice framework for specifi iter data flow analys that permit client to develop new optim pass with rel littl effort for exampl the vortex dead assign elimin pass is approxim line of code public some recent paper i ve author or co author person i love veri spici food as they say mild is a four letter word and coke i should probabl kick my caffein habit most of my enjoy moment are spent with my wife heidi and my daughter victoria i appear in acm ieee supercomput pittsburgh pa novemb abstract the ibm sp is one of the most power commerci mpp yet in spite of it fast processor and high network bandwidth the sp s commun latenc is inferior to older machin such as the tmc cm or meiko cs thi paper investig the use of activ messag am commun primit as an altern to the standard messag pass in order to reduc commun overhead and to offer a good build block for higher layer of softwar the first part of thi paper describ an implement of activ messag sp am which is layer directli on top of the sp s network adapt tb with compar bandwidth sp am s low overhead yield a round trip latenc that is lower than ibm mpl s the second part of the paper demonstr the power of am as a commun substrat by layer split c as well as mpi over it split c benchmark are use to compar the sp to other mpp and show that low messag overhead and high throughput compens for sp s high network latenc the mpi implement is base on the freeli avail mpich version and achiev perform equival to ibm s mpi f on the na benchmark design and perform of activ messag on the sp chi chao chang grzegorz czajkowski and thorsten von eicken cornel cs technic report softwar on the power processor we assum familiar with the concept underli activ messag the main perform characterist are a one word messag round trip time of us and an asymptot network bandwidth of mb paragon and the sp low latenc commun over atm network use activ messag thorsten von eicken veena avula anyndia basu vineet buch present at hot interconnect ii aug palo alto ca an abridg version of thi latenc by over an order of magnitud as compar to earlier propos thi paper examin whether these techniqu can carri over to cluster of workstat connect by an atm network even though cluster use standard oper system softwar are equip with network interfac optim for stream commun do not allow direct protect user level access to the network and use network without reliabl transmiss or flow control in a first part thi paper describ the differ in commun characterist between cluster of workstat built from standard hardwar and softwar compon and state of the art multiprocessor the lack of flow control and of oper system coordin affect the commun layer design significantli and requir larger buffer at each end than on multiprocessor a second part evalu a prototyp implement of the low latenc activ messag commun model on a sun workstat cluster interconnect by an atm network measur show applic to applic latenc of about microsecond for small messag which is roughli compar to the activ messag gdb insid gdb do file am_run and then attach pid where pid the the proc id of the am_run process on the node be debug hit return on node to let comput proceed onc you ve attach gdb to am_run am_run is stop by gdb and you can set breakpoint look at stack frame etc activ messag activ messag is a low overhead commun layer that offer high perform commun on mani parallel machin a nativ activ messag distribut comput dure the last year horu wa use to demonstr groupwar and fault toler over high perform network and wa found to offer higher perform than other similar system novel featur of horu are perform real time capabl our approach combin element of a commun technolog call activ messag with a multi media playback system call continu media by the end of the year we expect to demonstr high speed interact applic with remot multimedia server such as might be use in remot telemedicin applic or video on demand system all of thi will retain the exist fault toler and secur option of horu and it virtual synchroni program model prior work on isi ha creat a substanti user base and we expect rapid uptak of horu within thi commun as it matur isi user span a wide rang of industri includ telecommun system financi trade system stock market autom factori floor process control for discret electron compon manufactur air traffic control and space base commun system manag and control applic of isi are be explor in sever branch of the militari as well as the nsa and other non militari govern branch among the more visibl militari effort is the naval hiper d project which is explor the use of isi in a new system that prototyp technolog for futur enhanc of the aegi battl radar system the more demand applic in thi user base would benefit from access to horu and our initi plan is to make it possibl to migrat isi applic to horu with few chang thu benefit thi commun in a direct way technolog transit ha occur through licens agreement with isi distribut system inc a subsidiari of stratu comput howev all of our cornel work is also avail to research at no fee and is describ through detail public and program manual look to the futur we hope that a mixtur of isi and horu technolog will permit us to develop some of the veri demand applic that will be seen in next gener groupwar and plan system the illustr below show such an applic a militari mission control and plan system that integr data from a varieti of space air and ground resourc and use thi to coordin action of variou theatr asset system of thi sort will demand the utmost in perform reliabl and secur while also toler failur and rapidli reconfigur to respond to chang demand success in our project will thu impact a wide rang of both civilian and militari technolog effort dept of comput scienc cornel univers ken cs 985seq home page time to put order in the databas order time put in the databas time to put the databas in order document content project object current statu motiv exampl seq data model sequin queri languag optim techniqu seq system develop public relat work contact inform project object a number of import databas applic requir the process of larg amount of order sequenc data the domain of these applic includ financi manag histor analysi econom and social scienc metereolog medic scienc and biolog scienc exist relat databas are inadequ in thi regard data collect are treat as set not sequenc consequ express sequenc queri is tediou and evalu them is ineffici databas should model the data use the abstract of sequenc allow data sequenc to be queri in a declar manner util the order semant take advantag of the uniqu opportun avail for queri optim and evalu integr sequenc data with relat data so that user can store and queri a combin of relat and sequenc these requir serv as the goal of the seq project variou kind of sequenc need to be support tempor sequenc be the most import kind queri should be express use notion like next and previou which are natur when consid sequenc these queri should be optim so that they can be evalu effici these issu need to be studi in theori and then a databas system need to be built that demonstr the feasibl of the theoret idea project statu the current statu of the project is we have defin the seq data model that can support most import kind of sequenc data we have also defin algebra queri oper that can be compos to form sequenc queri analog to the composit of relat algebra oper to form relat queri we have describ how sequenc queri can be effici process and have identifi variou optim techniqu we use a sequenc queri languag sequin that can declar express queri over sequenc a sequin queri can includ embed express in a relat queri languag like sql or vice versa we are build a disk base databas system to demonstr the feasibl of our propos the system implement the seq model use a nest complex object architectur it is built over the shore storag manag and can process sever megabyt of data relat and sequenc are support in an integr and extens manner motiv exampl of a sequenc queri a weather monitor system record inform about variou meteorolog phenomena there is a sequenti in the occurr of these phenomena the variou meteorolog event are sequenc by the time at which they are record a scientist ask the queri for which volcano erupt did the most recent earthquak have a strength greater than on the richter scale if thi queri is to be express in a relat queri languag like sql complex featur like groupbi claus correl subqueri and aggreg function are requir further a convent relat queri optim would not find an effici queri execut plan even given the knowledg that the earthquak and volcano relat are sort by time howev a veri effici plan exist if one model the data as sequenc order by time the two sequenc can be scan in lock step similar to a sort merg join the most recent earthquak record scan can be store in a temporari buffer whenev a volcano record is process the valu of the most recent earthquak record store in the buffer is check to see if it strength wa greater than possibl gener an answer thi queri can therefor be process with a singl scan of the two sequenc and use veri littl memori the key to such optim is the sequenti of the data and the queri data model the detail of the seq data model are describ in a publish paper click here for postscript version here we present the gist of it the basic model of a sequenc is a set of record map to an order domain of posit thi mani to mani relationship between record and posit can be view in two dual but distinct way as a set of record map to each posit or as a set of posit map to each record these two view are call posit and record orient respect and each give rise to a set of queri oper base on that view queri on sequenc could requir oper of either or both flavor the record orient oper are similar to relat oper and includ variou kind of join overlap contain etc and aggreg such oper have been extens explor by research in the tempor databas commun the posit oper includ next previou offset move aggreg etc further oper allow zoom oper on sequenc by mean of collaps and expand the order domain associ with the sequenc for instanc a daili sequenc could be zoom out i e collaps to a weekli sequenc or zoom in i e expand to an hourli sequenc the last part of the model deal with oper on group i e set of sequenc the advantag is that thi make it easi to model queri involv sequenc collect which is the case in mani real world situat all the sequenc oper are extend to work with group of similar sequenc instead of with singl sequenc thi extens of the seq model indic that a practic implement of seq would probabl involv a nest complex object system sequin queri languag we have devis a queri languag call sequin use which declar sequenc queri can be specifi the languag is similar in flavor to sql except that the input to queri as well as the result of queri are sequenc click here for a descript of the sequin languag with exampl optim techniqu we have propos new optim techniqu for sequenc queri involv posit oper there are exist techniqu that have been propos for queri with record orient oper our optim use queri transform meta data and cach of intermedi result to effici evalu a queri an optim queri evalu plan can be gener use an algorithm that reli on cost estim one of the import observ is that access sequenc data in a singl stream is probabl veri effici and evalu strategi should take thi into account the detail of the optim techniqu are describ in a publish paper click here for postscript version system develop the seq databas system ha a client server architectur support multipl client via a multi thread server the server is built on top of the shore storag manag both sequin and a subset of sql are support as queri languag which can be embed insid each other the data model is a nest complex object model that allow arbitrari level of nest of relat insid sequenc and vice versa the system is also extens provid support for new data type new order domain user defin function new storag implement and new queri languag for more detail on the seq system click here public sequenc queri process praveen seshadri miron livni and raghu ramakrishnan proceed of the acm sigmod confer on data manag may seq a framework for sequenc data praveen seshadri miron livni and raghu ramakrishnan proceed of the ieee confer on data engin 989shore project home page shore a high perform scalabl persist object repositori document content object overview releas inform mail list see also shore version on line inform sourc binari and document the beta releas of shore version public relat to shore peopl work on shore latest research summari for arpa paradis project a gi built on shore exodu project the predecessor to shore oo benchmark a benchmark for oodb shore photo album uw madison databas research group uw madison cs depart server object the object of the shore project is to design implement and evalu a persist object system that will serv the need of a wide varieti of target applic includ hardwar and softwar cad system persist program languag geograph inform system satellit data repositori and multi media applic shore expand on the basic capabl of the wide use exodu storag manag develop at wisconsin fund by arpa in a number of way includ support for type object multipl program languag a unix like hierarch name space for name object and a unix compat interfac to object with a text field thi interfac is intend to eas the transit of applic from the unix file system environ to shore as exist unix tool such as vi and cc will be abl to store their data in shore object without modif basic a unix file becom either a singl shore object or the text field of a more complex object overview shore is someth of a hybrid system by natur inherit characterist both from object orient databas system and from file system thi section briefli describ the basic featur of shore the paper shore up persist applic describ shore in much greater detail shore ha three major goal scalabl support for hardwar and languag heterogen support for exist file base applic when the shore project began year ago these goal were uniqu among the research and commerci oodbm commun while the odmg effort ha also concentr on provid some degre of support for languag heterogen which in turn facilit hardwar heterogen shore remain distinguish by it focu on scalabl and support for applic that depend on the unix file system for persist storag furthermor sinc the shore data model sdl is basic compat with the odmg data model odl we expect that much of the technolog that we develop can eventu be transfer to the commerci sector scalabl architectur shore s softwar architectur is uniqu is sever way first shore use a symmetr peer to peer distribut architectur in shore everi particip processor run a shore server process whether or not the processor ha shore data disk attach the softwar ha been design to be scalabl it can run on a singl processor a network of workstat or a larg parallel processor such as the intel paragon or ibm sp thi design is in contrast to the client server architectur use by exodu and all the oodbm vendor while a client server architectur is fine for a design environ such as is typic use in softwar and hardwar cad effort it is not scalabl the second uniqu featur of the shore architectur is it notion of a valu ad server by structur the softwar that run in the server with extens in mind it is rel simpl for user to build applic specif server for exampl the paradis project is alreadi use the shore server to build a geograph inform system for nasa s eosdi project we feel that these two uniqu piec of technolog will play a import role in a varieti of futur research and commerci endeavor for exampl the digit librari of the futur will almost certainli depend on the avail of scalabl persist object technolog such system are go to store retriev manipul and transmit object contain video and pictur as well as text while current oodbm product could be use these system are orient toward deal with gigabyt and not terabyt of data customiz is equal import the index retriev and queri process mechan need for a digit librari are veri differ from those requir for a geograph inform system languag and hardwar heterogen object in shore are type shore provid a singl languag neutral type system that is use to defin the type of all shore object thi type system is embodi in the shore data languag sdl which is the languag in which shore object type are defin sdl enhanc the omg data model idl with support for databas featur such as bulk type e g set and list and persist the provis of type persist object simplifi the task of support heterogen hardwar environ and make it feasibl to support access to persist object from multipl program languag which is a key object of the shore project as mention earlier sdl is quit close relat to odl the languag neutral object type definit languag that wa recent propos as a standard by the oodb vendor consortium odmg in term of it emphasi howev odmg ha larg concentr on provid a standard interfac to exist c orient oodb our focu is on support for inter languag object share within a larg name space of object support for exist file base applic a major goal of shore is to enabl applic that current use untyp byte orient file for their persist data flatten and un flatten their data each time it is access to stop do so such applic should be abl to store their data as type structur object for more conveni type safe intra and inter program data share our ultim hope is that shore will displac byte orient file system such as the unix file system shore provid two major servic from a file system standpoint first to support object name and space manag in a world with mani persist object shore provid a flexibl tree structur unix like name space in which all persist object are reachabl either directli or indirectli do so give shore user a familiar framework in which to regist individu persist object term regist object the root of larg persist data structur or bulk set of unnam object term anonym object the realiz of thi framework involv sever differ kind of shore file system object includ directori pool which are file contain anonym object symbol link and cross refer shore provid two mechan to eas the transit of legaci unix applic such as compil editor and cad system from tradit byte stream file to shore first for applic that can be re link shore provid a standard unix compat file system interfac e g open close read write mkdir chdir in order to make access to shore object via unix file system call possibl the defin of a shore object type can option design one variabl length byte string or charact string attribut of the object as be the object s unix data program that attempt to read an object through shore counterpart of the unix file system call will onli see thi portion of the object for legaci program that wish to do so without be re link it is possibl to nf mount a shore file system and access the unix data contain in it object directli thi make it feasibl for both new and old applic to access the same set of object while old applic can onli access the unix data compon of the object new applic can defin and access other more structur attribut of the object releas inform below is the latest time tabl for the releas of shore these date are approxim and subject to chang if you have ani question contact shore_support cs wisc edu beta releas on may we had our first beta releas beta releas the second beta rleas of shore the sourc document and a binari releas sparc and pentium solari can be found at ftp ftp cs wisc edu shore mail list there are two shore relat mail list shore_support cs wisc edu and shore_al cs wisc wisc edu thi is a mail list for user of and those interest in shore thi list is manag by the listproc softwar at the uw madison cs depart it is current unmoder but in the unlik event that it get clutter with junk mail we will moder it mail messag if you are interest in the list but your mailbox is alreadi too clutter you can sign up for weekli digest see below for more inform more inform about the list will be sent when you subscrib purpos of shore_al notifi interest parti of new releas and other chang in the shore ftp archiv request for help from other user by default repli will be sent onli to the sender rather than be post to the entir list if you want the entir list to see your repli just copi the repli to shore_al thi list is an public mail list thu anyon may subscrib to it onli subscrib may post to the list the exist of thi list is shown in the list return by listproc when it process a list request when you subscrib your subscript is conceal by default that is other subscrib can not obtain the membership list from the listproc system subscrib to shore_al to subscrib or to chang your subscript you must mail a special messag to listproc cs wisc edu to subscrib the
