991pattern separ via mathemat program pattern separ via mathemat program thi www page describ work in pattern separ via linear program in the mathemat program section of the univers of wisconsin madison comput scienc depart brief histori and method outlin mathemat optim approach in particular linear program have long been use in problem of pattern separ in linear program were use to construct plane to separ linearli separ point set separ by a nonlinear surfac use linear program wa also describ whenev the surfac paramet appear linearli e g a quadrat or polynomi surfac these formul howev could fail on set that were not separ by a surfac linear in it paramet a multisurfac method msm avoid thi difficulti msm separ disjoint finit point set in n dimension euclidean space as follow choos parallel plane in n dimension euclidean space as close togeth so that onli the region between the two plane contain point from both set i e the region not between the parallel plane contain onli point of set or no point discard the point in the region not between the parallel plane repeat the process on the point between the parallel plane until the region between the parallel plane contain no point or veri few point multisurfac method tree msm t a variant on the multisurfac method wa develop in a b let a and b be finit disjoint point set in n dimension euclidean space the goal of msm t is to determin a sequenc of plane in n dimension euclidean space that separ the set a and b as follow determin a plane in n dimension euclidean space that minim the averag distanc of misclassifi point a point from set a is misclassifi if it lie on the side of the separ plane assign to b similarli a point from set b is misclassifi if it lie on the side of the separ plane assign to a if the region assign to a and b contain onli or mostli point of the set a or b then stop otherwis gener anoth error minim plane in in thi region the sequenc of plane gener can be view as a decis tree for each node in the tree the best split of the point reach that node is found by solv the lp in abov the node is split into branch and the same procedur is appli until there are onli or mostli point of one set at the node thi linear program approach can also be view as train a neural network with hidden layer see msm t ha been shown to learn concept as well or better than more tradit learn method such as c and cart it also ha an advantag over artifici neural network ann method such as backpropag in that train proce much faster see a implement of msm t msm t ha been implement in c use the mino numer optim packag by nick street and kristin bennett msm t ha also been implement for the matlab optim packag by paul bradley follow is a descript of the matlab implement of msm t togeth with the m file requir to run it chronolog bibliographi o l mangasarian linear and nonlinear separ of pattern by linear program oper research vol no may june page o l mangasarian multisurfac method of pattern separ ieee transact on inform theori vol it no novemb page a k p bennett decis tree construct via linear program proceed of the th midwest artifici intellig and cognit scienc societi confer page b k p bennett and o l mangasarian robust linear program discrimin of two linearli insepar set optim method and softwar vol page o l mangasarian mathemat program in neural network orsa journal on comput vol no fall page last modifi wed jul by paul bradley paulb cs wisc edu

mathemat model of natur and data object repres the object of mathemat model mathemat object frequent contain infinit precis real number and function with infinit domain wherea comput data object contain finit amount of inform and are thu approxim to the mathemat object they repres comput display contain finit amount of inform i e they contain finit number of pixel their color are chosen from finit palett anim sequenc contain finit number of frame etc and are thu approxim to ideal display becaus of the close relationship between data and comput a data model should be appropri for the data object of a comput model such as a program languag the purpos of data visual is to commun the inform content of data object in particular we defin express condit on the map from data object to display lattic v of display we can interpret the express condit in thi context and show that d satisfi the express condit if and onli if it is a lattic isomorph we can defin a particular lattic us appropri display is a set of voxel each voxel is specifi by a set of graphic primit that we call display scalar e g a pixel s locat and size in a volum it color and it place in an anim sequenc we can show that function d us vv satisfi the express condit are just the class of function defin by map from the scalar use for primit variabl in data object to the display scalar that specifi graphic primit of voxel of cours design of scientif display alreadi assum that primit variabl are map to graphic primit for exampl given a data object of type array time of temperatur it is natur to display it as a graph with time along one axi and temperatur along anoth the remark thing is that we do not have to take thi way of design display as an assumpt but that it is a consequ of the more fundament express condit 1000machin learn for cancer diagnosi and prognosi machin learn for cancer diagnosi and prognosi thi page describ variou linear program base machin learn approach which have been appli to the diagnosi and prognosi of breast cancer thi work is the result of a collabor at the univers of wisconsin madison between prof olvi l mangasarian of the comput scienc depart and dr william h wolberg of the depart of surgeri and human oncolog here is a copi of the press releas distribut at the american cancer societi scienc writer seminar in march of it provid a good overview of thi research tabl of content diagnosi prognosi bibliographi citat in the popular press local relat link other relat link diagnosi thi work grew out of the desir by dr wolberg to accur diagnos breast mass base sole on a fine needl aspir fna he identifi nine visual assess characterist of an fna sampl which he consid relev to diagnosi in collabor with prof mangasarian and two of hi graduat student rudi setiono and kristin bennett a classifi wa construct use the multisurfac method msm of pattern separ on these nine featur that success diagnos of new case the result data set is well known as the wisconsin breast cancer data the imag analysi work began in with the addit of nick street to the research team the goal wa to diagnos the sampl base on a digit imag of a small section of the fna slide the result of thi research have been consolid into a softwar system known as xcyt which is current use by dr wolberg in hi clinic practic the diagnosi process is now perform as follow an fna is taken from the breast mass thi materi is then mount on a microscop slide and stain to highlight the cellular nuclei a portion of the slide in which the cell are well differenti is then scan use a digit camera and a frame grabber board the user then isol the individu nuclei use xcyt use a mous pointer the user draw the approxim boundari of each nucleu use a comput vision approach known as snake these approxim then converg to the exact nuclear boundari thi interact process take between two and five minut per slide here is an imag show xcyt in use onc all or most of the nuclei have been isol in thi fasion the program comput valu for each of ten characterist of each nuclei measur size shape and textur the mean standard error and extrem valu of these featur are comput result in a total of nuclear featur for each sampl base on a train set of case a linear classifi wa construct to differenti benign from malign sampl thi classifi consist of a singl separ plane in the space of three of the featur extrem valu of area extrem valu of smooth and mean valu of textur by project all the case onto the normal of thi separ plane approxim probabl densiti of the benign and malign point were construct these allow a simpl bayesian comput of probabl of malign for new patient these densiti are shown to the patient allow her to judg the confid of her diagnosi by comparison to hundr of previou sampl to date thi system ha correctli diagnos consecut new patient benign malign in onli eight of those case did xcyt return a suspici diagnosi that is an estim probabl of malign between and a small subset of the sourc imag use in thi research can be found here these are veri good test case for imag segment or object recognit algorithm if your pet segment algorithm can automat identifi all of the nuclei in these imag pleas email me street cs wisc edu and let s work togeth prognosi the second problem consid in thi research is that of prognosi the predict of the long term behavior of the diseas we have approach prognosi as a function approxim problem use input featur includ those comput by xcyt to predict a time of recurr in malign patient use right censor data our solut is term the recurr surfac approxim method rsa and util a linear program to construct a surfac which predict time of recurr for new patient by examin the actual recurr of those train case with similar predict recurr time we can plot the probabl of diseas free surviv for variou time out to year for an individu patient thi capabl ha been incorpor into xcyt and an exampl is shown here these surviv curv plot the probabl of diseas free surviv versu time in year the black diseas free surviv curv repres all patient in our origin studi the red curv repres the probabl of diseas free surviv for the sampl case thi particular case therefor ha an abov averag prognosi with a probabl of be diseas free after year equal to about the rsa procedur can also be use to compar the predict power of variou prognost factor our result indic that precis detail cytolog inform of the type provid by xcyt give better prognost accuraci than the tradit factor tumor size and lymph node statu if corrobor by other research thi result could remov the 1004the paradis project paradis a parallel databas system for gi applic document content object client server paradis sampl of the paradis frontend contact inform see also public relat to paradis peopl work on paradis shore project object manag use for paradis the opt extens optim paradis bug report examin the sequoia benchmark script use in the vldb paper inform on ssl uw madison databas research group uw madison cs depart server object the object of the paradis project is to design implement and evalu a scalabl parallel geograph inform system that is capabl of store and manipul massiv data set by appli object orient and parallel databas technolog to the problem of store and manipul geograph inform we hope to significantli advanc the size and complex of gi data set that can be success store brows and queri client server paradis paradis is a databas system aim at handl gi type of applic paradis provid a graphic user interfac for queri and brows the databas and support a subset of sql for issu ad hoc queri paradis provid an extend relat data model for model gi applic in addit to support for the base data type such as integ real and string paradis ha built in support for raster polygon polylin point circl and video mpeg imag data paradis use shore as it underli persist object manag the paradis front end allow you to display object with spatial attribut on a d map the map provid a layer display for overlap spatial attribut each layer correspond to one queri you can custom the order and display of the layer by select color label and other display attribut for each queri the databas can be queri either with a graphic interfac or with ad hoc queri the graphic interfac can be be use to issu implicit spatial queri by zoom click and sketch a rubber band box for ad hoc queri paradis provid a queri compos menu in the queri compos provid access to the databas schema to assist in queri composit queri result can either be view on the d map if they have spatial attribut or they can be display in a tabl so that you can brows the tupl in the result the front end also provid context sensit help paradis support a subset of sql for issu ad hoc queri to sql we have ad the abil to invok method defin on the extend set of type for exampl you can calcul the area of a polygon by use the method polygon area paradis also support the standard databas oper includ creat and drop databas creat and drop extent creat and drop indic insert and updat the current version of paradis employ a client server architectur the front end ship queri in our sql syntax to the paradis server for execut after execut the queri the server ship the result object back to the client the paradis server is multi thread so that multipl client can connect to the same server in design and implement the paradis sever care attent wa paid to insur that the system could effici process queri especi those involv spatial attribut on larg volum of data sampl of the paradis frontend europ data for more sampl press here contact inform paradis project attn prof david j dewitt univers of wisconsin madison comput scienc depart west dayton street madison wi email paradis cs wisc edu more to come biswadeep nag bng cs wisc edu

file for these problem complementar toolbox for matlab thi evolv freeli avail toolbox consist of sever mex and m file these allow all the mcplib problem to be access from matlab without access to gam the mex file give function evalu and spars jacobian evalu machin specif version can be download the path solver is also avail in thi toolbox more detail below solver interfac to gam thi describ a librari of routin that are avail to help hook your solver to the gam mcp model languag contact steve gam com rutherford colorado edu or ferri cs wisc edu for further detail mile mile is an extens of the classic josephi newton method for ncp in which the solut to each linear subproblem is comput via lemk s almost complementari pivot algorithm thi newton point is use to defin the newton direct which is then use in a damp linesearch the merit function use measur both the violat in feasibl and in complementar mile also employ a restart procedur in case where the newton point can not be comput due to termin in a secondari ray everi linear subproblem is rescal to equilibr the element appear in the data of the subproblem path run under gam mcp or directli under matlab the path solver appli techniqu similar to those use in newton method for smooth system to a nonsmooth reformul of the mcp the algorithm consist of a sequenc of major iter each consist of an approxim or linear step similar to that of mile the construct of a path to the newton point the solut to the approxim and a possibl search of thi path when the newton point doe not exist or the path can not be entir construct a step along the partial comput path is taken befor the problem is relinear a nonmonoton watchdog strategi is employ in appli the path search thi help avoid converg to local minima of the norm function for the underli nonsmooth equat and keep the number of function evalu requir as small as possibl a list of solver option is given in the document ne sqp the ne sqp algorithm is base upon reformul the ncp as a system of nonsmooth equat the ne sqp algorithm implement as a gam mcp solver it robust improv use a proxim perturb strategi give the qpcomp algorithm the nonsmooth of the equat is handl use direct deriv of h smooth the smooth algorithm is base upon reformul the ncp as a system of nonsmooth equat and then approxim solv a sequenc of smooth approxim which lead to a zero of the nonsmooth system at each iter a smooth approxim to the origin system is form where the accuraci of the approxim is determin by the residu of the current point thi is implement as a gam mcp system other solver have been implement as subsystem of gam and are compar in thi paper applic of complementar engin and econom applic of complementar problem thi paper list mani of the known applic of complementar problem mpsge a preprocessor for the gam model languag that allow econom equilibrium problem to be formul easili see the gam home page for further inform nem the nation energi model system there are sever paper on relat algorithm and a paper give an overview of the project relev web link look up michael trick s oper research page for some interest or link look up interior point web for inform on languag optim techniqu seq system develop public relat work contact inform project object a number of import databas applic requir the process of larg amount of order sequenc data the domain of these applic includ financi manag histor analysi econom and social scienc metereolog medic scienc and biolog scienc exist relat databas are inadequ in thi regard data collect are treat as set not sequenc take advantag of the uniqu opportun avail for queri optim and evalu integr sequenc data with relat data so that user can store and queri a combin of relat and sequenc these requir serv as the goal of the seq project variou kind of sequenc need to be support tempor sequenc be the most import kind queri should be express use notion like next and previou which are natur when consid sequenc these queri should be optim so that they can be evalu effici these issu need to be studi in theori and then a databas system need to be built that demonstr the feasibl of the theoret idea project statu the current statu of the project is we have defin the seq data model that can support most import kind of sequenc data we have also defin algebra queri oper that can be compos to form sequenc queri analog to the composit of relat algebra oper to form relat queri we have describ how sequenc queri can be effici process and have identifi variou optim techniqu we use a sequenc queri languag sequin that can declar express queri over sequenc a sequin queri can includ embed express in a relat queri languag like sql or vice versa we are build a disk base databas system to demonstr the feasibl of our propos the system implement the seq model use a nest complex object architectur it is built over the shore storag manag and can process sever megabyt of data relat and sequenc are support in an integr and extens manner motiv exampl of a sequenc queri a weather monitor system record inform about variou meteorolog phenomena there is a sequenti in the occurr of these phenomena the variou meteorolog event are sequenc by the time at which they are record a scientist ask the queri for which volcano erupt did the most recent earthquak have a strength greater than on the richter scale if thi queri is to be plan even given the knowledg that the earthquak and volcano relat are sort by time howev a veri effici plan exist if one model the data as sequenc order by time the two sequenc can be scan in lock step similar to a sort merg join the most recent earthquak record scan can be store in a temporari buffer whenev a volcano record is process the valu of the most recent earthquak record store in the buffer is check to see if it strength wa greater than possibl gener an answer thi queri can therefor be process with a singl scan of the two sequenc and use veri littl memori the key to such optim is the sequenti of the data and the queri data model the detail of the seq data model are describ in a publish paper click here for postscript version here we present the gist of it the basic model of a sequenc is a set of record map to an order domain of posit thi mani to mani relationship between record and posit can be view in two dual but distinct way as a set of record map to each posit or as a set of posit map to each record these two view are call posit and record orient respect and each give rise to a set of queri oper base on that view queri on sequenc could requir oper of either or both flavor the record orient oper are similar to relat oper and includ variou kind of join overlap contain etc and aggreg such oper have been extens explor by research in the tempor databas commun the posit oper includ next previou offset move aggreg etc further oper allow zoom oper on sequenc by mean of collaps and expand the order domain associ with the sequenc for instanc a daili sequenc could be zoom out i e collaps to a weekli sequenc or zoom in i e expand to an hourli sequenc the last part of the model deal with oper on group i e set of sequenc the advantag is that thi make it easi to model queri involv sequenc collect which is the case in mani real world situat all the sequenc oper are extend to work with group of similar sequenc instead of with singl sequenc thi extens of the seq model indic that a practic implement of seq would probabl involv a nest complex object system sequin queri languag we have devis a queri languag call sequin use which declar sequenc queri can be intermedi result to effici evalu a queri an optim queri evalu plan can be gener use an algorithm that reli on cost estim one of the import observ is that access sequenc data in a singl stream is 1044the opal oper system project opal the opal project is explor a new oper system structur tune to the need of complex applic such as cad cam where a number of cooper program manipul a larg share persist databas of object in opal all code and data exist with in a singl huge share address space the singl address space enhanc share and cooper becaus address have a uniqu for all time interpret thu pointer base data structur can be directli commun and share between program at ani time and can be store directli on secondari storag without the need for translat thi structur is simplifi by the avail of a larg address space such as those provid by the dec alpha mip r hp pa risc and ibm rs protect in opal is independ of the singl address space each opal thread execut within a protect domain that defin which virtual page it ha the right to access the right to access a page can be easili transmit from one process to anoth the result is a much more flexibl protect structur permit differ and dynam chang protect option depend on the trust relationship between cooper parti we believ that thi organ can improv both the structur and perform of complex cooper applic an opal prototyp ha been built for the dec alpha platform on top of the mach oper system inform sourc list of opal relat paper faculti member hank levi ed lazowska jeff chase duke univers current graduat student mike feeley ashutosh tiwari vivek narasayya dylan mcname relat inform singl address space mail list archiv 
1045simultan multithread home page simultan multithread project overview peopl public overview the crucial problem face today s high speed microprocessor is maintain high processor util in the face of long instruct and memori latenc to allevi thi problem modern processor issu multipl instruct per cycl i e superscalar or interleav the execut of differ thread in differ cycl multithread processor ultim though both techniqu are limit by the amount of parallel avail within a singl thread in a singl cycl simultan multithread smt is a techniqu that permit multipl independ thread to issu instruct to a superscalar s function unit in a singl cycl smt combin the multipl instruct issu featur of wide superscalar processor with the latenc hide abil of multithread architectur on an smt processor all hardwar context are activ simultan compet each cycl for all avail resourc thi dynam share of processor resourc enabl smt to exploit thread level and instruct level parallel interchang both form of parallel can be effect use to increas processor util our studi have demonstr that simultan multithread significantli improv processor throughput and perform on both multiprogram and parallel workload we have shown that these perform gain can be achiev in an architectur with onli minim extens to modern out of order superscalar processor our current and futur work includ investig of fast synchron techniqu enabl by smt we are also conduct research in other architectur and compil issu for simultan multithread peopl faculti susan egger hank levi graduat student jack lo dean tullsen industri collabor digit equip corpor joel s emer rebecca l stamm public convert thread level parallel into instruct level parallel via simultan multithread abstract postscript j l lo s j egger j s emer h m
